qas.question: On what date did Universal City Studios open?
In square kilometers, what was the size of Universal City Studios?
What geographical feature separated Universal City Studios from Hollywood?
What was the biggest Hollywood studio during this period?
Who opened Universal City Studios on March 19, 1915?
What studio was built on a 230-km² converted farm?
Who opened his studio to tourists like other movie moguls?

context: On <a0_0>March 15, 1915<a0_0/>,:8 <b5_0>Laemmle<b5_0/> opened the world's largest motion picture production facility, <a3_0><b4_0><b6_0>Universal<a3_0/> City Studios<b6_0/><b4_0/>, on a 230-acre (<a1_0>0.9<a1_0/>-km²) converted farm just over the <a2_0>Cahuenga Pass<a2_0/> from Hollywood. Studio management became the third facet of Universal's operations, with the studio incorporated as a distinct subsidiary organization. Unlike other movie moguls, <b7_0>Laemmle<b7_0/> opened his studio to tourists. Universal became the largest studio in Hollywood, and remained so for a decade. However, it sought an audience mostly in small towns, producing mostly inexpensive melodramas, westerns and serials.
